Title: Bad Boys for Life
Writer: Joe Carnahan (screenplay by), Chris Bremner (screenplay by), Peter Craig (story by), Joe Carnahan (story by), Chris Bremner (story by)
Actors: Will Smith, Vanessa Hudgens, Martin Lawrence, Alexander Ludwig
Plot: Marcus Burnett is now a police inspector and Mike Lowery is in a midlife crisis. They unite again when an Albanian mercenary, whose brother they killed, promises them an important bonus.
